maskott.name: RGAA compliance
maskott.description:
The RGAA standard (RÃ©fÃ©rentiel GÃ©nÃ©ral d'AccessibilitÃ© pour les Administrations) is a set of rules and good practices designed to make websites and applications accessible to all, including people with disabilities.

This standard defines accessibility criteria related to navigation, content presentation, colours and contrast, as well as the use of assistive technologies (screen readers, specific keyboards, etc.).

The objective of the RGAA standard is to ensure equal opportunities by allowing all users to access all content and functionalities offered on websites and applications.
